title: Summon the Entity
desc:
Post 126
- Trap a player in the Trial Grounds. For their next 4 turns, they take 1d4-1 damage, but if they die during this time, they are revived at full health.
- Since Cyanberry does not feel like trapping herself, this item cannot be used on her. She also cannot use this item. **This rule only applies if that chaos modifier i suggested is on.**
